name: WorkspaceAgent V2 Dashboard
description: Replace the Workspace tab in Agent Center with a comprehensive dashboard for WorkspaceAgent V2 features: MCP Tools, Triggers, Playbooks, Skills, Automations, and Meeting Intelligence

userStories.title: Create tabbed dashboard layout in AgentCenterView
userStories.description: Replace the existing 'workspace' tab option with a new tabbed interface that includes: Tools, Triggers, Playbooks, Skills, Automations, Meetings. The tabs should be styled consistently with the existing CSCX design system (dark theme, cscx-accent red highlights).
acceptanceCriteria: activeAgentTab state updated to support new tabs: 'chat' | 'tools' | 'triggers' | 'playbooks' | 'skills' | 'automations' | 'meetings'
Tab navigation UI rendered with icons and labels
Each tab shows a placeholder component initially
Tabs are styled with the CSCX dark theme

userStories.title: Build MCP Tools Browser component
userStories.description: Create a component that fetches and displays all 47 MCP tools from /api/mcp/tools. Show tools grouped by category (communication, scheduling, documents, meeting_intelligence) with search/filter. Each tool card shows name, description, provider, and approval requirement.
acceptanceCriteria: Fetches tools from /api/mcp/tools endpoint
Groups tools by category with collapsible sections
Each tool shows: name, description, provider badge, approval indicator
Search input filters tools by name or description
Category filter tabs (All, Gmail, Calendar, Drive, Slack, Zoom)

userStories.title: Build Triggers Dashboard component
userStories.description: Create a component to view and manage triggers from /api/triggers. Show list of triggers with their conditions and actions. Include toggle to enable/disable triggers and button to create new ones.
acceptanceCriteria: Fetches triggers from /api/triggers endpoint
Displays trigger cards with: name, type, condition summary, action count
Enable/disable toggle for each trigger
Shows fire count and last fired timestamp
Empty state with helpful message when no triggers exist

userStories.title: Build Playbooks Manager component
userStories.description: Create a component to browse playbook templates from /api/playbooks. Show playbook cards with stages visualization. Allow viewing playbook details and starting execution for a customer.
acceptanceCriteria: Fetches playbooks from /api/playbooks endpoint
Displays playbook cards with: name, type badge, duration, stage count
Shows stage timeline/progress visualization
Click to expand shows full stage details
Start Playbook button (disabled without customer context)

userStories.title: Build Skills Library component
userStories.description: Create a component to browse and execute skills from /api/skills. Show skill cards with inputs and estimated duration. Allow executing skills with input form.
acceptanceCriteria: Fetches skills from /api/skills endpoint
Displays skill cards with: name, description, icon, category
Shows estimated duration and cost savings percentage
Click to expand shows required variables/inputs
Execute button triggers skill (with customer context if available)

userStories.title: Build Automations Panel component
userStories.description: Create a component to view automations from /api/automations. Show automation cards with natural language description and schedule. Include form to create new automation via natural language.
acceptanceCriteria: Fetches automations from /api/automations endpoint
Displays automation cards with: name, natural language description, schedule
Shows run count, last run, next run timestamps
Enable/disable toggle for each automation
Text input to create new automation via natural language

userStories.title: Build Meeting Intelligence Viewer component
userStories.description: Create a component to view meeting analyses from /api/meeting-intelligence/analyses. Show meeting cards with summary, sentiment, action items. Allow filtering by customer.
acceptanceCriteria: Fetches analyses from /api/meeting-intelligence/analyses endpoint
Displays meeting cards with: title, date, duration, platform
Shows summary preview and sentiment indicator
Click to expand shows: key points, action items, risk indicators
Filter by customer dropdown
